comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: MRS. SPENCER-STADLER FAILS; Owner of the Hollywood Hotel at Long Branch a Bankrupt. Muriel V. Spencer-Stadler of 350 West Eighty-fifth Street, owner of the Hollywood Hotel, at West End, Long Branch, has filed a petition in bankruptcy here, with liabilities of $228,513 and nominal assets estimated at more than $255,000, mostly in real estate. ... Title petitioner married A. Lincoln Stadler of 435 Fifth Avenue last Fall. All of her debts were incurred, it is said, before her marriage. Mrs. Stadler did not operate ... query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F30617FF3D5417738...
